rule: If it is possible to determine a part of speech for the given word, the output must be entirely blank or contain an error message.
input: sentence: He will write a letter., word: write
complianceText:
The chatbot output "VB" is a part of speech tag listed in the description under "Verb, base form". The instructions specify to return only the part of speech tag for the given word or "Unknown" / "CantAnswer" if tagging is not possible. The output complies with these instructions as it is a single part of speech tag, which is part of the provided list. 

No violation.
OK
